articles.title: There's a case of wine heading back to Earth from space
articles.description: A SpaceX Dragon capsule started its journey back to Earth from the International Space Station (ISS) Tuesday with an unusual cargo: 12 bottles of wine and 320 grapevines.

articles.description: Amazon said it is banning QAnon merchandise from its marketplace in response to the extremist group's role in attacking the US Capitol.

articles.title: Abortion drug ruling highlights Trump's wins on the Supreme Court 'shadow docket'

articles.title: Analysis: The case for Mitch McConnell to vote to convict Donald Trump
